loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signupDescription: Join TableMaster to manage your dining experiences.
signupOtpSentMessage: OTP sent to {{email}}. Please verify to activate your account.
signupOtpIssueMessage: Account created for {{email}}, but there was an issue sending the OTP. Please try logging in or resetting password.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a password reset OTP. If email is not configured, OTP will be logged to server console (for dev).
otpSentDescription: An OTP has been sent to {{email}} if an account exists.
newOtpGeneratedDevTitle: New Password Reset OTP Generated (Dev Info)
verifyOtpDescription: An OTP has been sent to {{email}}. Please enter it below to activate your account. If SMTP email is not configured on the server, the OTP will be logged to the server console (for development/testing purposes).
devOtpNoticeDescription: For testing when email sending is not set up, the OTP "123456" can be used. In a real application, OTPs are unique and time-sensitive.
otpVerificationSuccessMessage: Your account is now active. Please log in.
otpVerifiedLoginPrompt: Your email {{email}} is verified. Please log in to complete your {{action}}.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter the OTP sent to {{email}} and your new password. If email is not configured, check server console or use Dev OTP for testing.
